name: Toni Montano
text: Good & service were good! But in dire need of remodel. I don't know if we'll be back to this one one

name: Gavin Frazier
text: Thanks for relocating to where you no longer deliver to my neighborhood.  You have lost a longtime customer to Pizza Hut.  I will never buy from your restaurants again.  Wanting customers to show loyalty to your brand, but showing no loyalty to them is not a good way to do business.  Will call Dominoes or Papa Johns from now on...

name: Katie Martinez
text: Ordered my pizza online to go pick up and then when I got there to pick it up... It was closed!! And this is at 1PM. There is no signs showing its closed either! Thanks Ghetto Pizza Hut!

name: Andrew Rel
text: Horrible customer service. Don't go here.

text: They are rude there worst service ever its ghetto will never eat there again they should just shut it down
